entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • libhostpolicy.so required to execute app not found in '/usr/share/dotnet/shared/Microsoft.NETCore.App/7.0.4 #31705
  • Referencing an self-contained exe project from a framework-dependent project is currently broken. #31704
  • project configuration is set build disable, however `dotnet run -c` still build #31692

Closed

  • Missing packages for Ubuntu 21.04 aarch64/arm64 #17683
    Discussion
  • No package for Ubuntu 19.04 (Disco Dingo) #3128
    Discussion
  • 404 #18309
  • Ubuntu 21.10 wget URL not found! #22530
  • Unable to run net6.0 apps built with snap package on ubuntu 21.10 #22529
  • Request for Ubuntu 21.10 apt repo #22232
  • Cannot install dotnet SDK on Ubuntu 21.04 #18304
  • dotnet-sdk installed with snap crashes on Ubuntu 21.04 #18249
  • Failed to install dotnet-sdk-3.1 on ubuntu 21.04 #16900
    Discussion
  • IAsyncEnumerable on .NET 7 #31614
  • The specified RuntimeIdentifier 'linux-linux/amd64' is not recognized #31616

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #31732
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #31726
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update to 7.0.5 releasing today #31725
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #31724
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Updating the minimum VS version #31720
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #31712
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #31708
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the documentation around roll forward in the runtime config docs #31698
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, .NET 8.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #31697
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #31688
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #31714
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.3xx #31713
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.2xx #31716
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.1xx #31715
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Prep 7.0.3xx for GA release #31618
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.12.0 to 19.12.1 in /eng/dependabot #31682
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main
  • Add support for `DOTNET_WATCH_AUTO_RELOAD_WS_ENDPOINT` to `dotnet watch` #31575
    untriaged
  • Bundle Source Link packages #31632
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • 9500 dotnet tool install: Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade when specify version #31549
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add implementation and test for add Trademark assembly attribute #31611
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Allow `dotnet sln list` to display solution folder paths #18502
    Area-CLI
  • Wasm SDK packed as a nuget package #31519
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.117 #31602
  • Register off-by-default analyzer: configuration binding generator #31654
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, .NET 8.0
  • Move asset compression to the StaticWebAssets SDK #31559
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
